commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas6444bcb"

diff:
"6444bcb 392980 make it possible to QI FaviconLoadListener to nsIRequestObserver r=2xgavin,2xsayrer,mano
diff --git a/toolkit/components/places/src/nsFaviconService.cpp b/toolkit/components/places/src/nsFaviconService.cpp
index 1129341..d99f8f2 100644
--- a/toolkit/components/places/src/nsFaviconService.cpp
+++ b/toolkit/components/places/src/nsFaviconService.cpp
@@ -797,8 +797,9 @@ nsFaviconService::GetFaviconSpecForIconString(const nsCString& aSpec, nsACString
 }
 
 
-NS_IMPL_ISUPPORTS3(FaviconLoadListener,
-                   nsIStreamListener, // is a nsIRequestObserver
+NS_IMPL_ISUPPORTS4(FaviconLoadListener,
+                   nsIRequestObserver,
+                   nsIStreamListener,
                    nsIInterfaceRequestor,
                    nsIChannelEventSink)
 
"
